00014 #include "dummyport.h"
00015 
00016 XDummyPort::XDummyPort(XCharInterface *interface) :
00017     XPort(interface),
00018     m_stream()
00019 {
00020 }
00021 XDummyPort::~XDummyPort()
00022 {
00023     m_stream.close();
00024 }
00025 void
00026 XDummyPort::open() throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00027 {
00028     m_stream.open("/tmp/kamedummyport.log", std::ios::out);
00029 }
00030 void
00031 XDummyPort::send(const char *str) throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00032 {
00033     m_stream << "send:"
00034              << str << std::endl;
00035 }
00036 void
00037 XDummyPort::write(const char *sendbuf, int size) throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00038 {
00039     m_stream << "write:";
00040     m_stream.write(sendbuf, size);
00041     m_stream << std::endl;
00042 }
00043 void
00044 XDummyPort::receive() throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00045 {
00046     m_stream << "receive:"
00047              << std::endl;
00048     buffer().resize(1);
00049     buffer()[0] = '\0';
00050 }
00051 void
00052 XDummyPort::receive(unsigned int length) throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00053 {
00054     m_stream << "receive length = :"
00055              << length << std::endl;
00056     buffer().resize(length);
00057     buffer()[0] = '\0';
00058 }
